Templar said nothing. He was alive and well, at least physically. He 
grabbed the rim of the pod's hatch with one hand and pulled himself 
free. In the other hand, though, he carried something... no, it was 
someone, or rather had been.

Templar got out, carrying in his arms the shell of Umbral, a slender 
woman-bot, locked in pain through death. A massive blasthole was 
centered on her chest, surrounded by smaller blaster shots on the 
rest of her body.

The bodyguard laid her down wordlessly and started piling leaves on 
her. After she was covered, he kneeled and started crying quietly...

Templar: Let this be your final resting place, dear Umbral...
